mapper.select: select b.bill_id as "billId", b.bill_num as "billNum", b.bill_name as "billName", b.bill_type as "billType", c.code_value as "billTypeName", b.bill_obj_id as "billObjId", b.bill_amount as "billAmount", date_format(b.bill_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "billCreateTime", date_format(b.pay_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "payEndTime", b.bill_create_account as "billCreateAccount", b.bill_remark as "billRemark", CASE b.bill_status WHEN '0' THEN "待审核" WHEN '1' THEN "待支付" WHEN '2' THEN "已支付" WHEN '3' THEN "支付失败" WHEN '4' THEN "已确认支付" WHEN '5' THEN "支付审核失败" ELSE '-' END AS "billStatus", CASE b.is_urge WHEN '0' THEN "否" WHEN '1' THEN "是" ELSE '-' END AS "isUrge", CASE o.order_status WHEN '0' THEN "未支付" WHEN '1' THEN "已支付" ELSE '-' END AS "orderStatus", b.order_id as "orderId", o.order_num as "orderNum", o.order_name as "orderName", o.order_amount as "orderAmount", date_format(o.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "payTime", o.pay_id as "payId", o.pay_amount as "payAmount", CASE o.pay_type WHEN '0' THEN "微信" WHEN '1' THEN "支付宝" WHEN '2' THEN "银联" ELSE '-' END AS "payType", o.pay_remark as "payRemark" from tb_payment_bill b left join tb_payment_order o on b.order_id = o.id left join tb_payment_code c on c.id = b.bill_type where b.record_status = 1 and b.bill_id = #{idOrNum} or b.bill_num = #{idOrNum} LIMIT 1
